mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2( DATE, CSR_TYPEID, CO_ID, CAR_NO, PRO_DATE, CSR_REQID, CSR_CONT, FIX_AREAID, ZONEID, DEVICEID, FIX_CTGID, FIX_CONT, BE_IH, AF_IH, ETC, USERID, STATUSID, GPS_ANT, AUDIO_CAB, VIDEO_CAB, LED_CAB, Y_CAB, AFC_CAB, BMS_CAB, AUDIO_GENDER, CUSHION, LTE_ANT, WIFI_ANT, PRINT_BAR, HEXBOLT, BASEPLATE, SIMPLEID, REGDATE )VALUES( #{Date}, #{Csr_typeid}, #{Co_id}, #{Car_no}, #{Pro_date}, #{Csr_reqid}, #{Csr_cont}, #{Fix_areaid}, #{Zoneid}, #{Deviceid}, #{Fix_ctgid}, #{Fix_cont}, #{Be_ih}, #{Af_ih}, #{Etc}, #{Userid}, #{Statusid}, #{Gps_ant}, #{Audio_cab}, #{Video_cab}, #{Led_cab}, #{Y_cab}, #{Afc_cab}, #{Bms_cab}, #{Audio_gender}, #{Cushion}, #{Lte_ant}, #{Wifi_ant}, #{Print_bar}, #{Hexbolt}, #{Baseplate}, #{Simpleid}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, DATE, CSR_TYPEID, CO_ID, CAR_NO, PRO_DATE, CSR_REQID, CSR_CONT, FIX_AREAID, ZONEID, DEVICEID, FIX_CTGID, FIX_CONT, BE_IH, AF_IH, ETC, USERID, STATUSID, GPS_ANT, AUDIO_CAB, VIDEO_CAB, LED_CAB, Y_CAB, AFC_CAB, BMS_CAB, AUDIO_GENDER, CUSHION, LTE_ANT, WIFI_ANT, PRINT_BAR, HEXBOLT, BASEPLATE, SIMPLEID FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 SET DATE=#{Date}, CSR_TYPEID=#{Csr_typeid}, CO_ID=#{Co_id}, CAR_NO=#{Car_no}, PRO_DATE=#{Pro_date}, CSR_REQID=#{Csr_reqid}, CSR_CONT=#{Csr_cont}, FIX_AREAID=#{Fix_areaid}, ZONEID=#{Zoneid}, DEVICEID=#{Deviceid}, FIX_CTGID=#{Fix_ctgid}, FIX_CONT=#{Fix_cont}, BE_IH=#{Be_ih}, AF_IH=#{Af_ih}, ETC=#{Etc}, USERID=#{Userid}, STATUSID=#{Statusid}, GPS_ANT=#{Gps_ant}, AUDIO_CAB=#{Audio_cab}, VIDEO_CAB=#{Video_cab}, LED_CAB=#{Led_cab}, Y_CAB=#{Y_cab}, AFC_CAB=#{Afc_cab}, BMS_CAB=#{Bms_cab}, AUDIO_GENDER=#{Audio_gender}, CUSHION=#{Cushion}, LTE_ANT=#{Lte_ant}, WIFI_ANT=#{Wifi_ant}, PRINT_BAR=#{Print_bar}, HEXBOLT=#{Hexbolt}, BASEPLATE=#{Baseplate}, SIMPLEID=#{Simpleid} WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.select:
SELECT BNO ,USERID ,CSR_REQID ,STATUSID ,DATE FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 RNUM, A.BNO ,A.USERID ,A.CSR_REQID ,A.STATUSID ,A.DATE FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY REGDATE desc ) list WHERE RNUM >= #{rowStart} AND RNUM <= #{rowEnd}

SELECT A.BNO ,A.DATE ,A.REGDATE ,(SELECT DISTINCT B.CSR_TYPE FROM tCsr_Type B WHERE A.CSR_TYPEID=B.CSR_TYPEID) CSR_TYPE ,(SELECT DISTINCT B.CO_NM FROM tCo_Info B WHERE A.CO_ID=B.CO_ID) CO_NM ,A.CAR_NO ,(SELECT DISTINCT B.CSR_REQ FROM tCsr_Req B WHERE A.CSR_REQID=B.CSR_REQID) CSR_REQ ,A.CSR_CONT ,(SELECT DISTINCT B.FIX_AREA FROM tFix_Area B WHERE A.FIX_AREAID=B.FIX_AREAID) FIX_AREA ,(SELECT DISTINCT B.ZONE FROM tZone B WHERE A.ZONEID=B.ZONEID) ZONE ,(SELECT DISTINCT B.DEVICE FROM tDevice B WHERE A.DEVICEID=B.DEVICEID) DEVICE ,(SELECT DISTINCT B.FIX_CTG FROM tFix_Ctg B WHERE A.FIX_CTGID=B.FIX_CTGID) FIX_CTG ,A.FIX_CONT ,A.BE_IH ,A.AF_IH ,A.ETC ,(SELECT DISTINCT B.USER FROM tUser B WHERE A.USERID=B.USERID) USER ,A.GPS_ANT ,A.AUDIO_CAB ,A.VIDEO_CAB ,A.LED_CAB ,A.Y_CAB ,A.AFC_CAB ,A.BMS_CAB ,A.AUDIO_GENDER ,A.CUSHION ,A.LTE_ANT ,A.PRINT_BAR ,A.HEXBOLT ,A.BASEPLATE FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 A WHERE DATE(DATE) BETWEEN #{keyword1} AND #{keyword2} ORDER BY BNO ASC
SELECT CAR_NO, CSR_REQID, CO_ID, count(*) as num FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 WHERE DATE(DATE) BETWEEN #{keyword1} AND #{keyword2} GROUP BY CAR_NO, CSR_REQID, CO_ID HAVING num>1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 WHERE DATE(DATE) BETWEEN #{keyword1} AND #{keyword2}
SELECT CSR_REQID, COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 WHERE DATE(DATE) BETWEEN #{keyword1} AND #{keyword2} GROUP BY CSR_REQID ORDER BY NUM DESC
SELECT CO_ID, COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 WHERE DATE(DATE) BETWEEN #{keyword1} AND #{keyword2} GROUP BY CO_ID ORDER BY NUM DESC
SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(DATE), '-', MONTH(DATE)) YM, COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 GROUP BY YM ORDER BY YEAR(DATE) DESC, MONTH(DATE) DESC LIMIT 12

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 WHERE 1=1
and BNO > 0

if.if: AND USERID IN (select USERID from chatbot_temp.tUser where USER like '%' #{keyword} '%')
AND CO_ID IN (select CO_ID from chatbot_temp.tCo_Info where CO_NM like '%' #{keyword} '%')
AND CSR_REQID IN (select CSR_REQID from chatbot_temp.tCsr_Req where CSR_REQ like '%' #{keyword} '%')
AND BE_IH LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%' or AF_IH LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'

AND (DATE LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%') or (CO_ID IN (select CO_ID from chatbot_temp.tCo_Info where CO_NM like '%' #{keyword} '%'))or
(CAR_NO LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%')or (CSR_REQID IN (select CSR_REQID from chatbot_temp.tCsr_Req where CSR_REQ like '%' #{keyword} '%'))or (CSR_CONT LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%')or (FIX_AREAID IN (select FIX_AREAID from chatbot_temp.tFix_Area where FIX_AREA like '%' #{keyword} '%'))or (ZONEID IN (select ZONEID from chatbot_temp.tZone where ZONE like '%' #{keyword} '%'))or (DEVICEID IN (select DEVICEID from chatbot_temp.tDevice where DEVICE like '%' #{keyword} '%'))or (FIX_CONT LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%')or (BE_IH LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%')or (AF_IH LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%')or (USERID IN (select USERID from chatbot_temp.tUser where USER like '%' #{keyword} '%'))or (STATUSID IN (select STATUSID from chatbot_temp.tStatus where STATUS like '%' #{keyword} '%'))

mapper.select:
SELECT BNO ,CO_ID ,CAR_NO ,CSR_REQID FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 RNUM, A.BNO ,A.CO_ID ,A.CAR_NO ,A.CSR_REQID FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY REGDATE desc ) list WHERE RNUM >= #{rowStart} AND RNUM <= #{rowEnd}

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 WHERE 1=1
and BNO > 0

sql.if: AND CO_ID IN (select CO_ID from chatbot_temp.tCo_Info where CO_NM like '%' #{keyword1} '%' AND CAR_NO LIKE '%' #{keyword2} '%')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatbot_temp.tCsr_File( FILE_NO, BNO, ORG_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE )VALUES( #{FILE_NO}, #{BNO}, #{ORG_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE} )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO, ORG_FILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_File WHERE BNO = #{BNO} AND DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY FILE_NO ASC
SELECT STORED_FILE_NAME, ORG_FILE_NAME FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_File WHERE FILE_NO = #{FILE_NO}
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tCo_Info ORDER BY CO_ID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Req ORDER BY CSR_REQID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tFix_Area ORDER BY FIX_AREAID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tZone ORDER BY ZONEID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tDevice ORDER BY DEVICEID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tUser ORDER BY USERID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tStatus ORDER BY STATUSID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tCsr_Type ORDER BY CSR_TYPEID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tFix_Ctg ORDER BY FIX_CTGID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tSimple ORDER BY SIMPLEID ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tCar_region ORDER BY car_regionid ASC
SELECT * FROM chatbot_temp.tBus_type ORDER BY bus_typeid ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2( DATE, CO_ID, CAR_NO, CSR_REQID )VALUES( #{Date}, #{Co_id}, #{Car_no}, #{Csr_reqid})
INSERT INTO chatbot_temp.tManual( MFW, MCOMMENT, MREGDATE )VALUES( #{Mfw}, #{Mcomment}, NOW())
INSERT INTO chatbot_temp.tManual_File( mFILE_NO, MNO, mORG_FILE_NAME, mSTORED_FILE_NAME, mFILE_SIZE )VALUES( #{mFILE_NO}, #{MNO}, #{mORG_FILE_NAME}, #{mSTORED_FILE_NAME}, #{mFILE_SIZE} )
mapper.select: SELECT mFILE_NO, mORG_FILE_NAME, ROUND(mFILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS mFILE_SIZE FROM chatbot_temp.tManual_File WHERE MNO = #{MNO} AND mDEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY mFILE_NO ASC
SELECT mSTORED_FILE_NAME, mORG_FILE_NAME FROM chatbot_temp.tManual_File WHERE mFILE_NO = #{mFILE_NO}

SELECT MNO ,MREGDATE ,MFW ,MCOMMENT FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 RNUM, A.MNO ,A.MREGDATE ,A.MFW ,A.MCOMMENT FROM chatbot_temp.tManual A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY MREGDATE desc ) manuallist WHERE RNUM >= #{rowStart} AND RNUM <= #{rowEnd}

SELECT COUNT(MNO) FROM chatbot_temp.tManual WHERE 1=1
and MNO > 0
SELECT MNO, MREGDATE, MFW, MCOMMENT FROM chatbot_temp.tManual WHERE MNO = #{mno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatbot_temp.tFw( FW, FCOMMENT, FREGDATE )VALUES( #{Fw}, #{Fcomment}, NOW())
INSERT INTO chatbot_temp.tFw_File( fFILE_NO, FNO, fORG_FILE_NAME, fSTORED_FILE_NAME, fFILE_SIZE )VALUES( #{fFILE_NO}, #{FNO}, #{fORG_FILE_NAME}, #{fSTORED_FILE_NAME}, #{fFILE_SIZE} )
mapper.select: SELECT fFILE_NO, fORG_FILE_NAME, ROUND(fFILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS fFILE_SIZE FROM chatbot_temp.tFw_File WHERE FNO = #{FNO} AND fDEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY fFILE_NO ASC
SELECT fSTORED_FILE_NAME, fORG_FILE_NAME FROM chatbot_temp.tFw_File WHERE fFILE_NO = #{fFILE_NO}

SELECT FNO ,FREGDATE ,FW ,FCOMMENT FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 RNUM, A.FNO ,A.FREGDATE ,A.FW ,A.FCOMMENT FROM chatbot_temp.tFw A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY FREGDATE desc ) fwlist WHERE RNUM >= #{rowStart} AND RNUM <= #{rowEnd}

SELECT COUNT(FNO) FROM chatbot_temp.tFw WHERE 1=1
and FNO > 0
SELECT FNO, FREGDATE, FW, FCOMMENT FROM chatbot_temp.tFw WHERE FNO = #{fno}
SELECT DISTINCT CO_ID, CAR_NO from chatbot_temp.tCsr_Bo2 where CAR_NO like '%' #{keyword} '%' limit 2
